feast.sdk.utils.gs_utils¶

Helper function to interact with BigQuery

Functions

feast.sdk.utils.gs_utils.df_to_gcs(df, path)[source]¶

Writes the given df to the path specified. Will fail if the bucket does not exist.

Parameters:
  • df (pandas.DataFrame) – dataframe
  • path (str) – path in gcs to write to
feast.sdk.utils.gs_utils.gcs_to_df(path)[source]¶

Reads a file from gs to pandas

Parameters:path (str) – full gcs path to the file
Returns:dataframe
Return type:pandas.DataFrame

Parameters:path (str) – path to file
